content.rendered:

Bluetooth headphone

Immersive Crystal Sound & Smart Voice Command : Pollini headphones are constructed with 40mm neodymium driver and totally coated earmuffs to make sure superior High Fidelity stereo sound high quality and immersive music feast the place you could lose your self by overlaying carefully your ears. The wi-fi headphones work nice on Siri or Voice Assistant enabled gadgets that gives you with a way more handy machine operation expertise by merely delivering voice instructions with arms free.
Comfortable Design : The memory-protein ear cushions guarantee lasting sporting consolation as they simulate human pores and skin texture.The bluetooth headset could be adjusted to the proper match with the assistance of the sturdy high quality stainless-steel slider and tender padded headband.Pollini Bluetooth earphones are an ideal alternative for journey, sport or every day use by teenagers, boys and women, males and girls.
Seamless & Stable Connection : Long press the facility button and the headphones with microphone will enter pair mode and join with your Bluetooth enabled gadgets in seconds and stably with out interference.You can thus take pleasure in clean hands-free telephone calls.(NOTE: A Bluetooth transmitter is required for TV with out built-in Bluetooth operate). In addition,these wi-fi earphones can flip to be a pair of wired ones as a result of they’re additionally suitable with the three.5mm jack audio cable enabled machine.
User-friendly : Pollini over ear headphones not solely come with nice efficiency but in addition a classy look to remain standard. The ergonomic design of tremendous tender memory-protein foam leather-based earmuffs and headbands ensures a most consolation even after long-lasting put on. We additionally provide a protecting case to maintain the headsets when not in use for a neater storage and carrying in addition to to extend their service life.
Long Battery Life : Pollini bluetooth headphones are outfitted with 800mAh rechargeable battery that helps 30 hours of steady music enjoying time and requires 2.5 hours to get a quick full cost.
